comments.body: where do we call it outside of `StreamExecution`?

Here we removed `analyzedPlan` in the subclass params: https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/31842/files#diff-cf2dc65d70aa7bc490d237f1c50f5fdf51e244fabed782977a94d2934c208551L41. Now the `analyzedPlan` is called directly in subclass `MicroBatchExecution` and `ContinuousExecution`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +70,74 @@    override val name: String,
    private val checkpointRoot: String,
    val analyzedPlan: LogicalPlan,
    val sink: Table,
    val trigger: Trigger,
